title: Ionian Skin for Jarvan IV?
body:
Question to everyone; is the Ionian skins meant to be just for Ionian origin characters?

If not then can Jarvan IV have one?
The moving parts to his Javelin weapon would work perfectly.
His Shield would have cool magical visual effects.
His Flag has a different design (flag of Ionia?).

replies.body: i got ieda, sawp j4 wtih ierlai.
The thing is, Jarvan is from Demacia, Yi is from ionia, I don't think it'd work too well with the name but as a different name it could.
Ionian Jarvan provides a new way if looking at the character. It follows Riot's philosophy about skins; that they should provide and alternate universe, a different character but not.
